full_summary:
### All Terrain Vehicle (ATV) Tender Announcement #
#### Overview
The Department of National Defence has a requirement to procure 48 All Terrain Vehicles (ATVs) for delivery to various Canadian Defence locations.

#### Background
The Department of National Defence has a requirement to procure All Terrain Vehicles (ATVs) that meet the specified requirements. The requested delivery date is within 120 days from contract award.

#### Terms and Conditions
* Quantity: 48 All Terrain Vehicles (ATVs)
* Delivery Locations: Petawawa, ON; Borden, ON; Gagetown, NB
* Delivery Date: 120 days from contract award
* Mandatory Requirements: See Annex A (Requirement) and Annex B (Basis of Payment)
* No security requirements associated with this requirement
* Notice of Proposed Procurement: available on the Canada Buys website

#### Submission Requirements
Submissions may be provided in either official language of Canada. Bidders must review all documents contained within the solicitation package.

#### Debriefings
Successful bidders may request a debriefing within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful. Debriefings may be provided in writing, by telephone or in person.

#### Attachment and Supporting Documents

### Additional Information
* Trade Agreements: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), and others
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Regions of Opportunity: World
* Regions of Delivery: Canada
* Contracting Entity Name: Department of National Defence
